name: df-gch
body: |- wceq(cgch, cun(cfn, cab(s0, wal(s1, wn(wa(wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), csdm, cpw(cv(s0)))))))))
comment: Define the collection of "GCH-sets", or sets for which the generalized continuum hypothesis holds. In this language the generalized continuum hypothesis can be expressed as ` GCH = _V ` . A set ` x ` satisfies the generalized continuum hypothesis if it is finite or there is no set ` y ` strictly between ` x ` and its powerset in cardinality. The continuum hypothesis is equivalent to ` _om e. GCH ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2015.)
